description.narrative: In this WP JCP-III provides support to BIG in their task to execute the national "One Map" policy (ITC) and the LIDAR-based lowland elevation mapping (Deltares). This will be done through training on topics requested by BIG.
Increased capacity at BIG to execute their task related to the "One Map Policy" and the Lowland Elevation Mapping.

title.narrative: The creation of the LiDAR based lowland elevation map for East Sumatra is understood and the accuracy is assessed by BIG and written down in a joint scientific publication.
1 Lowland Elevation Map for East Sumatra assessed by BIG. 1 Peer-reviewed Article

description.narrative: LiDAR based lowland elevation map for East Sumatra assessed by BIG. Methodology and accuracy assessment published in peer-reviewed scientific journal.

baseline.value: Existing map not yet assessed by BIG No peer-reviewed paper

target.value: 1 LiDAR based lowland elevation map for East Sumatra known and accuracy assessed by BIG and 1 Methodology and accuracy assessment published in peer-reviewed scientific journal.

actual.value: 1 paper submitted: Comparison between DEMNAS and LiDAR based DTMs for two coastal lowland areas in Indonesia

title.narrative: BIG staff is better equipped in executing their tasks related to the One Map initiative with respect to the extraction of buildings from Lidar point clouds and the spatial integration of data from different sources.
Training materials and manuals for extracting buildings from Lidar point clouds and for the spatial integration of data from different sources

description.narrative: Set of Manuals and Training Materials

comment.narrative: Training materials for LiDAR course and Training materials for VGI course

title.narrative: Better trained staff that can effectively contribute to the development and implementation of the One Map initiative.
Number of participants BIG staff Possibly also for LAPAN staff

description.narrative: The number of organised workshops. Planned are an Inception workshop three Internal Workshops one External Workshop and one Steering Comite Meeting

comment.narrative: LiDAR training @ BIG (April 2019): 20 staff VGI training @ BIG (May 2019): 21 staff

title.narrative: Trained BIG research staff in the LiDAR processing algorithm and LiDAR strip method applied in the generation of the East Sumatra lowland DTM. Accuracy of the DTM assessed.

description.narrative: Training on LiDAR processing algorithm and LiDAR strip method (2 days) for up to 10 BIG staff several (~5) working sessions of 1 day for dedicated (up to 5) BIG staff.
